description: Coordination sequence for net formed by holes in D_4 lattice.
references: M. O'Keeffe, Coordination sequences for lattices, Zeit. f. Krist., 210 (1995), 905-908.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for sequences related to D_4 lattice
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,1,-4,1,2,-1).
maple: f := n-> if n mod 2 = 0 then 12*n^3+8*n-8 else 12*n^3+4*n+8; fi; #(for n>1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
